attributes.action: SOC - Save Our Celery - Allow celery into our football stadiums
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Celery is a very important tradition of supporters of Chelsea Football Club. Chelsea Football Club are now banning fans bringing celery into the stadium as it is illegal to throw about. I would therefore like to see a special law introduced which allows the freedom for football fans to throw celery in any football stadium in the UK.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
